title: Pixel 3a + Google One + Adding members
content:
So I am thinking of getting Google One, mostly because I have a new Pixel 3a and want to be able to keep max picture quality when backing up photos.

Here's my question - if I add my wife (she also has a Pixel 3a) as a member of my Google One, will she then be able to keep max picture quality when backing up photos as well?

Many thanks
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
